name: Soul Locked
description:
You play Asmodeus, a demon that have been sentenced to a eternety of torments in hell. Chained by the neck, you are continously attacked by the spirits of your victims.

They come from soul stones. By destroying those, you grow your chain longer.

Find the hidden Axe in each level to free your chain.

This game was developped in two days for the mini jam by a group of four people : MaybeYouChill (dev), Shrimpakt (3D-model & animations), Jbey (music) and powernoel (level design).
